Member Enumeration Documentation

template<class GraphicsItemClass>
enum iqt2d::TShapeBase::ColorSheme

Enumerator:
SelectedColor  Color for a selected shape.
EditableColor  Color for a shape, that can be edited on the graphics view.
InactiveColor  Color for a shape, that can not be edited on the graphics view.
DefaultColor  Standard shape color.
